title: Book, "Proposed Alterations at Oddington, Gloucestershire", 1813
medium:
Leather with gilding, off-white wove paper
Brush and watercolor, pen and ink, graphite on off-white wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Green and gilt, leather bound album containg text and watercolor drawings related to the architectural and landscape rennovations at Oddington.
